asheville.neighborhoods: Downtown, Biltmore Village, West Asheville, River Arts District
asheville.meetingHighlights: Active mountain-area fellowship with many small-group and outdoor-friendly meetings; notable speaker nights.
asheville.transitInfo: Asheville Red Line buses serve downtown and neighborhoods; Asheville Regional Airport for regional flights.

cary.neighborhoods: Downtown Cary, Carpenter, Amberly, Weston, Preston, Lochmere
cary.meetingHighlights: Suburban meetings that draw from the wider Raleigh–Durham area; many weekday and commuter-friendly options.
cary.transitInfo: GoTriangle and local bus services link Cary to Raleigh and Durham; Raleigh-Durham International Airport (RDU) for flights.

charlotte.neighborhoods: Uptown, South End, Plaza Midwood, NoDa, Dilworth, Ballantyne
charlotte.meetingHighlights: Large and diverse meeting calendar across neighborhoods with numerous specialty meetings and strong newcomer programs.
charlotte.transitInfo: CATS buses and Lynx light rail connect the city; Charlotte Douglas International Airport (CLT) serves national and international flights.

durham.neighborhoods: Downtown, Duke University, North Durham, Watts-Hillandale
durham.meetingHighlights: University-influenced meetings with active student participation and a variety of formats including Big Book and step groups.
durham.transitInfo: GoDurham and GoTriangle provide transit across the Research Triangle; Raleigh-Durham International Airport (RDU) serves the region.

fayetteville.neighborhoods: Downtown, Haymount, Fort Bragg area, Cross Creek, Lakewood, Highland
fayetteville.meetingHighlights: Meetings that serve both military and civilian populations with many evening and weekend groups.
fayetteville.transitInfo: Cumberland County Area Transit and Fort Bragg transit options; regional highways and Fayetteville Regional Airport.

greenville.meetingHighlights: Community meetings with steady participation and several campus-linked groups at East Carolina University.
greenville.transitInfo: GREAT bus services and regional transit; Pitt-Greenville Airport for regional flights.

raleigh.neighborhoods: Downtown, North Hills, Glenwood South, Five Points, Oakwood
raleigh.meetingHighlights: Extensive meeting options across the Research Triangle with many daytime, evening, and specialty meetings.
raleigh.transitInfo: GoTriangle regional services and local buses; Raleigh-Durham International Airport (RDU) serves national flights.

greensboro.neighborhoods: Downtown, Fisher Park, Irving Park, Lindley Park
greensboro.meetingHighlights: Diverse downtown and neighborhood meetings with regular speaker nights and active service groups.
greensboro.transitInfo: GTA buses and regional transit; Piedmont Triad International Airport for flights.

wilmington.neighborhoods: Downtown, Riverfront, Wrightsville Beach, Carolina Beach
wilmington.meetingHighlights: Coastal meetings with a blend of city and beach-community groups; several evening and newcomer-support meetings.
wilmington.transitInfo: Wave transit and regional bus services; Wilmington International Airport for regional flights.

asheboro.meetingHighlights: Small-town meetings with steady local participation and community-focused support.
asheboro.transitInfo: Local bus services and regional road access via US-220.
